mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FILE ( FILE_ID, SEQ, CATEGORY, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( #{fileId}, #{seq}, #{category}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{originFileName}, #{fileSize}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID, SEQ, FILE_NAME, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT FILE_ID, SEQ, FILE_NAME, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_NAME = #{fileName}
SELECT SEQ FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{FILE_ID} ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
